document_data.caption: The location of the Gap of Skulls in the [[Scimitar Spires]].
document_data.name: Gap of Skulls
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gap of Skulls''' was one of two paths across the [[Scimitar Spires]] in the [[Anauroch]] desert.
document_data.Geography: The Scimitar Spires was a mountain chain to the east from the [[Shoal of Thirst]], with the Gap of Skulls, along with the [[Road of Jackals]] being the two known passages across. The Gap of Skulls was the northernmost of them.
